ai-kv13.5:1.3_0: Their greed gives up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv13.5:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.5:1.5_0: They give up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv13.5:1.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.5:2.1_0: The path associated with greed is the mind associated with the mind.
ai-kv13.5:2.4_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv13.5:2.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.5:2.6_0: Greed is the path, skilled in goodness,
ai-kv13.5:2.8_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv13.5:2.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.5:3.1_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv13.5:3.4_0: “Mendicants, these four things are very far apart.
ai-kv13.5:3.7_0: This is the first thing that is easy to teach for someone who is easy to teach and the Dhamma. That’s why it is for one who is assured.”
ai-kv13.5:4.4_0: “When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward knowledge of the ending of defilements.”
ai-kv13.5:4.8_0: “She has become covered with ten hindrances” ...
ai-kv13.5:5.5_0: “Someone who knows and sees such a thing as sensual pleasures is freed from defilements by not grasping. ...
ai-kv13.5:5.6_0: my mind was free from the pollutant of ignorance.”
ai-kv13.5:5.9_0: So he gives up the hindrances that are saved.
ai-kv13.5:5.10_0: The story at the end is finished.
